name: .ritual (World 1 Demo)
description:
A young artificer seeks a city spoken of in legends. Explore ruins and collect pieces of an ancient relic. WIP- Please put any feedback you have in comments or on twitter @net_merc I would reeally appreciate it

1/3 - A small site for .ritual with more to come can be found here!

6/1 - New version of the demo! Same level, new particles! Among other things. Shout out to everyone who gave wonderful feedback! Hopefully this version is much more comprehensive based on what you've told me. Oh, also Windows version should be Oculus compatible now! Will automatically start in VR mode if it detects a headset.

6/7 - Ok the demo actually works now for people who don't have Oculus drivers sorryy u~u;
